alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:52PM MST until March 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with icy and snow packed roads, and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
